articles.title: Over 8000 employees in India laid off by Meesho, Ola, Unacademy and other startups - India Today
articles.description: Popular start-ups including Unacademy, Cars24, Vedanta, Meesho, Trell, Furlenco and many others let go of over 5000 employees in India.

articles.title: Windfall tax explained — why ONGC, Oil India are spooked by it - CNBCTV18
articles.description: There is speculation that the government might impose a windfall tax on oil-producing companies which has put pressure on stocks like ONGC, Oil India, Reliance and Vedanta. If this happens, what are the factors that can be at play?
